You’re no match for me.\""},{"lineNumber":49843,"originalJapaneseLine":"「けっ、俺様のオーラも読み取れん雑魚か。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, you’re a weakling who can’t even read my aura."},{"lineNumber":49844,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前ごときに用はないが、ひとつ聞いてやろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"I have no use for someone like you, but I’ll ask one thing.\""},{"lineNumber":49845,"originalJapaneseLine":"「遺言か？　いやさ、情報収集の捨て駒であるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"A last will? No, are you a disposable pawn for gathering information?"},{"lineNumber":49846,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前の腹の中の女の子、美人か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is the girl inside your belly beautiful?"},{"lineNumber":49847,"originalJapaneseLine":"「腹……頭脳に使う人間の事であるか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Belly... You mean the person you use your brain for?"},{"lineNumber":49848,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのような事、知らぬであるぞ。見てもいない」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don’t know anything like that. I haven't seen either.\""},{"lineNumber":49849,"originalJapaneseLine":"「けっ、役に立たんな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, useless."},{"lineNumber":49850,"originalJapaneseLine":"　じゃあ割って見るとするか。死ね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Then I guess I’ll break you open. Die!\""},{"lineNumber":49851,"originalJapaneseLine":"「見るは我が整然たる隊列の強さをこそ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Behold the strength of my orderly formation."},{"lineNumber":49852,"originalJapaneseLine":"　かかれ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Attack!\""},{"lineNumber":49853,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………あれ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":49854,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達はいつの間にか、","translatedEnglishLine":"Before they knew it, Rance and his companions"},{"lineNumber":49855,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニー軍の陣地深くに入り込んでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"had gotten deep into the Honey army's camp."},{"lineNumber":49856,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やあやあ、我こそは関羽・H・雲長ぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey hey, I am Guan Yu H Uncho,"},{"lineNumber":49857,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ハニーキング一の盟友なり」","translatedEnglishLine":"the closest ally of the Honey King.\""},{"lineNumber":49858,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだかえらそうなハニーが立ちはだかる。","translatedEnglishLine":"A somewhat pompous Honey stood in their way."},{"lineNumber":49859,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戦場でまみえたからには人間よ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Since we've met on the battlefield, human,"},{"lineNumber":49860,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いざいざ勝負なり！」","translatedEnglishLine":"now, let’s have a proper match!\""},{"lineNumber":49861,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃーっ、関羽さまかっこいいー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaa, Lord Guan Yu is so cool!\""},{"lineNumber":49862,"originalJapaneseLine":"「武将ごっこいいないいなー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Playing warlord is so fun."},{"lineNumber":49863,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺もやろー」","translatedEnglishLine":"I wanna play too!\""},{"lineNumber":49864,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………なんだこいつら。遊んでるのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What are these guys? Are they just playing around?\""},{"lineNumber":49865,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、で、でも襲ってきますよランス様！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-but they’re going to attack, Lord Rance!"},{"lineNumber":49866,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんだかすっごく強そうです！」","translatedEnglishLine":"They look really strong!\""},{"lineNumber":49867,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ、なんだか納得いかんが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, somehow this doesn't sit right with me...\""},{"lineNumber":49868,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーーーーーっ！　さあ尋常に勝負ーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haaaaa! Now then, a fair fight!\""},{"lineNumber":49869,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、やかましい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Enough, be quiet!"},{"lineNumber":49870,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バラバラにしてくれるわ、この陶器が！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll shatter you all, you piece of pottery!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よいしょ、よいしょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heave-ho, heave-ho."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最前線から、少し離れた辺り。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A little distance away from the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの視線の先で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the direction of Rance's gaze,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 石を積み上げているハニーの姿があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was Honey stacking stones.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「陣地構築…………かしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Constructing fortifications... I wonder?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっほ、えっほ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heave-ho, heave-ho.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふふふ、人間いじめだー。楽しいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehehe, bullying humans is so fun."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍に協力すれば可哀想な女の子、いっぱいだね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you cooperate with the demon army, there will be lots of poor girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えへへ、楽しみ楽しみ。よいしょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, I'm looking forward to it. Heave-ho."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんか呑気してやがるな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...They seem pretty carefree.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相変わらず、よく分からん連中だ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As always, they’re a bunch I just don't understand..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ウルザさんの作戦は……まだなのかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wonder if Urza-san’s plan hasn’t started yet..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、砕いておくか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I guess I’ll smash it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女の子捕まえたら拷問しちゃうもんね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When we catch the girls, we'll torture them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さあ、情報を吐けー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come on, spit out the information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さもなくばソックスをくるぶしまで下げちゃうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or else I'll pull your socks down to your ankles."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃー、俺もう割れそうー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaa, I’m about to break already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっともっと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More, more..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーっ、積み上げてた石がーっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahh, the stones I stacked—!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、とりあえず死ね、ハニワ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha, just die for now, Honey-wa!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見ぃーーーつけたぞーーー、当たり付き！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I fiiiiind youuuu— jackpot!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むむっ、敵軍であるか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, is that the enemy army?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やられに来たか、人間め！　構え！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have you come to be killed, human?! Prepare yourselves!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍は直属の護衛に命じ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general ordered his direct guards,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: びしりと隊列を整えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and sharply arranged their formation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし、来い来い。叩き殺してくれるわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, come at me. I'll beat you to death."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むむっ……隊列もバラバラ、装備も統一感なく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... The formation is all over the place, the equipment uncoordinated,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵種さえ不揃い……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even the troop types are mismatched...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴様ら、正規兵ではないのであるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You lot are not regular soldiers, are you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふん、と魔物将軍は嘲るように鼻を鳴らす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general snorted mockingly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦の論理も知らぬ野良傭兵であるか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you just stray mercenaries who don't understand the logic of war?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 失せるがいいであるぞ。私の相手にはならぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You better disappear. You’re no match for me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「けっ、俺様のオーラも読み取れん雑魚か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, you’re a weakling who can’t even read my aura.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前ごときに用はないが、ひとつ聞いてやろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have no use for someone like you, but I’ll ask one thing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「遺言か？　いやさ、情報収集の捨て駒であるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A last will? No, are you a disposable pawn for gathering information?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前の腹の中の女の子、美人か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is the girl inside your belly beautiful?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「腹……頭脳に使う人間の事であるか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Belly... You mean the person you use your brain for?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのような事、知らぬであるぞ。見てもいない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t know anything like that. I haven't seen either."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「けっ、役に立たんな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, useless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃあ割って見るとするか。死ね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then I guess I’ll break you open. Die!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見るは我が整然たる隊列の強さをこそ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Behold the strength of my orderly formation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かかれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Attack!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はいつの間にか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before they knew it, Rance and his companions

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー軍の陣地深くに入り込んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: had gotten deep into the Honey army's camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やあやあ、我こそは関羽・H・雲長ぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey hey, I am Guan Yu H Uncho,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーキング一の盟友なり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the closest ally of the Honey King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだかえらそうなハニーが立ちはだかる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A somewhat pompous Honey stood in their way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦場でまみえたからには人間よ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Since we've met on the battlefield, human,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いざいざ勝負なり！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: now, let’s have a proper match!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃーっ、関羽さまかっこいいー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaa, Lord Guan Yu is so cool!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「武将ごっこいいないいなー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Playing warlord is so fun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺もやろー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wanna play too!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………なんだこいつら。遊んでるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What are these guys? Are they just playing around?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、で、でも襲ってきますよランス様！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "B-but they’re going to attack, Lord Rance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだかすっごく強そうです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They look really strong!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、なんだか納得いかんが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, somehow this doesn't sit right with me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーーーーーっ！　さあ尋常に勝負ーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haaaaa! Now then, a fair fight!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、やかましい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Enough, be quiet!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バラバラにしてくれるわ、この陶器が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll shatter you all, you piece of pottery!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Now then, a fair fight!\""},{"lineNumber":49869,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、やかましい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Enough, be quiet!"},{"lineNumber":49870,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バラバラにしてくれるわ、この陶器が！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll shatter you all, you piece of pottery!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よいしょ、よいしょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heave-ho, heave-ho."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最前線から、少し離れた辺り。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A little distance away from the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの視線の先で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the direction of Rance's gaze,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 石を積み上げているハニーの姿があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was Honey stacking stones.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「陣地構築…………かしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Constructing fortifications... I wonder?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっほ、えっほ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heave-ho, heave-ho.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふふふ、人間いじめだー。楽しいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehehe, bullying humans is so fun."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔軍に協力すれば可哀想な女の子、いっぱいだね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you cooperate with the demon army, there will be lots of poor girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えへへ、楽しみ楽しみ。よいしょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, I'm looking forward to it. Heave-ho."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんか呑気してやがるな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...They seem pretty carefree.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相変わらず、よく分からん連中だ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As always, they’re a bunch I just don't understand..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ウルザさんの作戦は……まだなのかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wonder if Urza-san’s plan hasn’t started yet..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、砕いておくか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I guess I’ll smash it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女の子捕まえたら拷問しちゃうもんね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When we catch the girls, we'll torture them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さあ、情報を吐けー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come on, spit out the information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さもなくばソックスをくるぶしまで下げちゃうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or else I'll pull your socks down to your ankles."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃー、俺もう割れそうー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaa, I’m about to break already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっともっと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More, more..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーっ、積み上げてた石がーっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahh, the stones I stacked—!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、とりあえず死ね、ハニワ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha, just die for now, Honey-wa!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見ぃーーーつけたぞーーー、当たり付き！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I fiiiiind youuuu— jackpot!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むむっ、敵軍であるか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, is that the enemy army?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やられに来たか、人間め！　構え！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have you come to be killed, human?! Prepare yourselves!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍は直属の護衛に命じ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general ordered his direct guards,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: びしりと隊列を整えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and sharply arranged their formation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし、来い来い。叩き殺してくれるわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, come at me. I'll beat you to death."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むむっ……隊列もバラバラ、装備も統一感なく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... The formation is all over the place, the equipment uncoordinated,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵種さえ不揃い……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even the troop types are mismatched...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴様ら、正規兵ではないのであるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You lot are not regular soldiers, are you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふん、と魔物将軍は嘲るように鼻を鳴らす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general snorted mockingly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦の論理も知らぬ野良傭兵であるか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you just stray mercenaries who don't understand the logic of war?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 失せるがいいであるぞ。私の相手にはならぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You better disappear. You’re no match for me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「けっ、俺様のオーラも読み取れん雑魚か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, you’re a weakling who can’t even read my aura.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前ごときに用はないが、ひとつ聞いてやろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have no use for someone like you, but I’ll ask one thing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「遺言か？　いやさ、情報収集の捨て駒であるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A last will? No, are you a disposable pawn for gathering information?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前の腹の中の女の子、美人か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is the girl inside your belly beautiful?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「腹……頭脳に使う人間の事であるか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Belly... You mean the person you use your brain for?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのような事、知らぬであるぞ。見てもいない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t know anything like that. I haven't seen either."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「けっ、役に立たんな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, useless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃあ割って見るとするか。死ね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then I guess I’ll break you open. Die!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見るは我が整然たる隊列の強さをこそ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Behold the strength of my orderly formation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かかれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Attack!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はいつの間にか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before they knew it, Rance and his companions

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー軍の陣地深くに入り込んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: had gotten deep into the Honey army's camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やあやあ、我こそは関羽・H・雲長ぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey hey, I am Guan Yu H Uncho,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーキング一の盟友なり」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the closest ally of the Honey King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだかえらそうなハニーが立ちはだかる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A somewhat pompous Honey stood in their way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦場でまみえたからには人間よ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Since we've met on the battlefield, human,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いざいざ勝負なり！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: now, let’s have a proper match!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃーっ、関羽さまかっこいいー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaa, Lord Guan Yu is so cool!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「武将ごっこいいないいなー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Playing warlord is so fun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺もやろー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wanna play too!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………なんだこいつら。遊んでるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What are these guys? Are they just playing around?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、で、でも襲ってきますよランス様！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "B-but they’re going to attack, Lord Rance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだかすっごく強そうです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They look really strong!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、なんだか納得いかんが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, somehow this doesn't sit right with me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーーーーーっ！　さあ尋常に勝負ーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haaaaa! Now then, a fair fight!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、やかましい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Enough, be quiet!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バラバラにしてくれるわ、この陶器が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll shatter you all, you piece of pottery!"
